name: BlockieWalkie
description:
You are an angry(?) robot and you jump. Discover ways to get the best time.

This game is a submission for Wowie Jam 2.0!  The theme is intentional bugs. I usually don't play/make platformers so my ideas for level ran out very fast.

Thanks for playing.

Unintentional bug - submitting your time on the 3rd level doesn't always work - i don't know why, i can't recreate it - so click it a few times, but wait for ~1s between clicks :)

Intentional bugs( its more fun to discover them :) )

  • (Not really a bug) Jumping on the blue thing will push you, it was supposed to be like the water in early BF3 but i think of it more like a basic mechanic.
  • You can stick to walls by going into them
  • If you wiggle while next to a wall you reset your jump
  • If you get to the top of the columns supporting the platforms , but under  the platforms themselves, you get pushed up and back(a lot)
  • If you press Esc before clicking Start you can move without the timer activating,  you can press Start after and the timer will start (writing your name while doing this is sometimes tricky)
  • You can go trough some walls(1)
